channel.title: Ranging on npcs help
channel.description:
Hi, I can't seem to find a tut how to make ranging on npcs :S But my ranging on players work. If anyone would be willing to post a tut link to a range on npc's, that would be nice.
~I dont care if the emote deosnt work ~dont care if it gives XP ~dont care if the arrows dont drop on the ground
I just want to make it so you need a bow, arrows equiped to range the opponent and the ranging bonus working. Thanks!
~~~pkingscape15.no-ip.info~~~ ~43594~
